queries.query: select isentoInputSheet from IsentoInputSheetEntity isentoInputSheet join fetch isentoInputSheet.arquivoInput arquivoInput join fetch isentoInputSheet.isentoInputSheetCols isentoInputSheetCols where arquivoInput.id = :arquivoInputId order by isentoInputSheet.sheetId, isentoInputSheetCols.ordem
